modName: Patches central for Invisibility Glitch - Eyes Fix and Invisibility Eye Glitch Multifix
summary:
Patches for the excellent Invisibility Eye Glitch Multifix by jimkaiseriv and Invisibility Glitch - Eyes Fix by KingsGambit to maintain compatibility with other mod
(Vigor, Invasion of Skyrim - Grand Admiral Thrawn, Extensible Follower Framework, Relationship Dialogue Overhaul - RDO, Sacrosanct - Vampires of Skyrim, Apocalypse - Magic of Skyri
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff7700][size=5][center]Invisibility Eye Glitch Multi Patches[/center][/size][/color]
[b]Patches to maintain compatibility between [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63451/?]Invisibility Eye Glitch Multifix[/url] by jimkaiseriv and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23916/?]Invisibility Glitch - Eyes Fix[/url] by [b]KingsGambit[/b] and various other mods.

Invisibility Eye Glitch Multifix and Invisibility Glitch - Eyes Fix work well for the vanilla game and many mods, but some mods use custom magic effects and spells that are not fixed by either one. This mod applies fixes from the two eye fix mods to the custom magic effects and spells used in these other mods so that the player and/or NPCs no longer have the invisibility eye bug

[/b]I made these patches for my personal use, and have tested them in my current playthrough. They haven't produce any spam in my papyrus log, and works as intend.
If you have a mod with custom invisibility effects, let me know in the comments section and I will see what I can do.


Before installing any of these patch, you need to install [u][b]one and only one[/b][/u] of these two mods, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63451/?]Invisibility Eye Glitch Multifix[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23916/?]Invisibility Glitch - Eye Fix[/url]
[b][size=3]
There are patches currently available for each of the following mods: [/size]

[/b][b]Vigor - Combat and Injuries by [b]Alex9ndre[/b] 
[/b][url=http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72180/?]http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72180/[/url]

[b]Ordinator - Perks of Skyrim by Enai Siaion[/b]
[url=http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68425/?]http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68425/?

[/url][b]Invasion of Skyrim - Grand Admiral Thrawn by Alex[/b]
[url=http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74565/?]http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74565/?[/url]

[b]Extensible Follower Framework by Expired[/b]
[url=http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?]http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?[/url]

[b]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul - RDO by cloudedtruth[/b] (only for Invisible Glitch - Eye Fix) - [u]User request, not needed if you don't have problem[/u]
[url=http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/?]http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/?[/url]

[b]Sacrosanct - Vampires of Skyrim by Enai Siaion[/b] (only for Invisible Glitch - Eye Fix)
[url=http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80159/?]http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80159/?[/url]

[b] Apocalypse - Magic of Skyrim by Enai Siaion[/b] (Courtesy of [b]Falkrun[/b])
[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16225]https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16225/?[/url]

You can merge the patches together with the excellent [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69905/?]Merge Plugins[/url] by [b]Mator.[/b]

[b]These patches consist of a small edit to maintain compatibility. The real geniuses are the respective mod authors that made the amazing work. Don't forget to endorse their mod.[/b]

I just used a script asset from one of these two to modify a magic effect.

[color=#ff7700][size=4][u]Credits[/u][/size][/color]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/3705814/?]Clevon[/url] [/b]who took time to explain me how i can made these patches (and a little more ^^)
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6335298]jimkaiseriv[/url] [/b]for the original mod and to let me publish these patches (permission granted)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1892262][b]KingsGambit[/b][/url] for his wonderful mod. (permission granted)
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/14425989]Alex9ndre[/url] [/b]for his amazing combat mod (permission granted)
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3959191]Enai Siaion[/url] [/b]for his lightweight perks mod (Authorize by mod permission)
[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5040927]Falkrun[/url] for his Apocalypse patches
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3900618]Mator[/url][/b] for is Merge plugin (and other mods that a lot of people use ^^)
